Text: Woodsville, New Hampshire:  Although North Haverhill is now the county seat of Grafton County, the village of Woodsville has traditionally been considered the county seat, as the county courthouse was originally located there.

Text: Woodsville, New Hampshire:  The county buildings are now located halfway between Woodsville and the village of North Haverhill to the south.
